name: Modas Technology
description: We are building a technology platform to analysis data and communicate the results to drivers with the goal of improving road safety.

team.title: CEO/Founder
team.name: Damian Horton
team.bioHtml: Start-up founder. Love FinTech and Autonomous Cars

jobs.title: Co-Founder & CTO
jobs.description:
I'm looking for a young CTO who loves to dig into code to help build out Modas from an very early stage. 

iOS and Android as a starting base before tackling Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. 

Connected and Autonomous cars are now on the horizon and give a huge opportunity to build a consumer-facing technology business that digests, interrogates and presents data to consumers in an engaging format. 

My experience includes time at various start-ups in the UK and Australia as well as investment banking before that. I have a university research background in driverless cars and autonomous vehicles.
